Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Category of metric (value of jmx query string  e.g. Hadoop:service=LlapDaemon,name=LlapDaemonCacheMetrics, etc).
Columns.Name: MetricNamespace

Columns.Description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. CacheCapacityRemaining, CacheCapacityRemainingPercentage,CacheCapacityTotal, etc).
Columns.Name: MetricName

Columns.Description: Value of metric in the record.
Columns.Name: MetricValue

Columns.Description: Information about the record. For example a record may be tagged with 'LlapDaemon' if it came from that process.
Columns.Name: Tags

Columns.Description: Name of host where log was emitted.
Columns.Name: HostName

Columns.Description: The operation associated with log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
